name: A CaSINo but Slightly More EVIL!!!
name_original: A CaSINo but Slightly More EVIL!!!
description:
5 Seconds late to the submission. ;(

WASD to move

Left Click to shoot

Rocket launcher and sword currently aren't in the game.

Traverse through 5 rooms. Every time you clear a room, you get a random gun, and a random modifier.

Art: PickleOstrich

Sound: jonlongbeard
